availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ezekiel Green LaFayette Bumpass (Henry County, Tennessee, daguerreotypist and farmer)

body.p: Henry County, Tennessee, daguerreotypist and farmer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Married to Margaret Julia Carson Bumpass in Henry County, Tennessee, on July 15, 1838. Father of Edwin R. Bumpass, Euthanazia Bumpass, Washington P. S. Bumpass, Florentine Bumpass, John Clay Y. Bumpass, Mary Pauline Bumpass, William H. Bumpass, Flora Bumpass, and Catherine Bumpass. Daguerreotypist in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
